data.name: GirlHub - adult puzzle game
data.detailed_description:
Gentleman's 3-match puzzle game!
A hot date with high-quality beauties~♡ You can meet from now on!
Appreciate her everything ♥ from head to toe.


[game introduction]
♥ A hot date story with her that you enjoy through 3 matching puzzles ♥

- The very rule that men and women of all ages have experienced at least once!
- Just the two of you♡ What will happen when you enter the dressing room?
- Choice to your liking♥ High quality illustrations that come alive
- Tocuh to her secret place! The higher the level of affection, the more special gifts

Experience everything. I will give you more exhilarating pleasure than the first experience~♡

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 1.4 GHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Mature imagery, Sexual Content.

Characters in the game can take off and put on their clothes through the dressing room. The costumes of the characters may be in full clothes, or they may be completely naked.
